statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -3 \\ 7 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ 8 \\ -12 \\ -28 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -3 \\ 7 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ 8 \\ -12 \\ -28 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
